srcwordsbare: ta-duk bəjə-l anti-war dʼiwə-wə isə-soː-tin təpkə-dʼə-so-n ukoŋ-gasin
trs: Then people saw some kind of monster, it shouted like a loon.

srcwordsbare: ta-duk awadi-kan ŋənə-rə-n tar haman isoː-hi-l-də-n
trs: Then, after some time had passed (?), the shaman was seen.

html:

trs: The people said to that man: "Don't touch the shaman, he'll make a taimen out of you".

srcwordsbare: ta-duk tar bəjə amtil-wi purta-t wa-rə-n hilukta-l-wa iru-ra-n
trs: Then that man killed his parents with a knife, he pulled out the intestines.

html:
Hirogir Nʼikalaj Nʼikalajevʼičʼ Nʼogdʼo amargu knʼazʼ nakazat-ta-mi nʼikə-so-n bəjə-l guː-rə nuŋa-n ə-sə moːnʼ-i-n oː-ra

trs: Nikolay Nikolaevich Hirogir, Nyogdo, the last prince, wanted to punish him, [but] the people said that he hadn't done it himself.

trs: That shaman had made him to do something bad.

srcwordsbare: knʼazʼ hamaːn-mə hekta-l-i-t duktə-so
